result.execSummary:
The defendant Lilian Fong was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Entry into/onto Bldg/Constuct.Site/Room [Modifiers: PTAC, as a Party to a Crime], a class A misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 943.15(1).

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes:
Amendment: Updated co-defendants for restitution.
Probation may be transferred to Milwaukee County
Early discharge at recommendation of agent if obligations fulfilled including all restitution paid in full

miscConds.notes: Joint and Several with Julian Cedron case 16CM144 and Cody Fyffe case 16CM149 and Brema H. Brema case 16CM147

If Probation is revoked or discharged with outstanding financial obligations, a civil judgment shall be entered against the defendant in favor of restitution victims and or governmental entities for the balance due.  All available enforcement actions will be used to collect the debt.
If revoked and sent to prison, DOC shall withhold 25% of all inmates monies to pay fines/costs with the balance due as a condition of extended supervision/parole.
No contact directly or indirectly with Marc Garfalo or the property at N3772 Garden Parkway Sheboygan Falls, WI.

Expungement under 973.015 upon; payment of fines/costs, no further law violations for one year, successful completion of probation.  Request must be made in writing using form CR-266 to the Court and District Attorney.

Turn over all photos of the property within one week to the Sheboygan Victim Witness Office on a flash drive with a letter indicating that all pictures are turned over.
Def cannot post or publish any photos of the property on any public forum.
